header.xliffext:poisonError: Handback file name: lo-mt_cs0157.855dc0714f6966b1b833e893910d45dba273b5aa.es-es is different with handoff file name: cs0157.855dc0714f6966b1b833e893910d45dba273b5aa.es-es.

trans-unit.target: Error del compilador CS0157 | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Control cannot leave the body of a finally clause
trans-unit.target: El control no puede salir del texto de una cláusula finally

trans-unit.source: All of the statements in a [finally](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/try-catch-finally.md) clause must execute.
trans-unit.target: Todas las instrucciones en un [finalmente](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/try-catch-finally.md) cláusula debe ejecutar.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Exception Handling Statements](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/exception-handling-statements.md) and [Exceptions and Exception Handling](../../csharp/programming-guide/exceptions/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [instrucciones de control de excepciones](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/exception-handling-statements.md) y [excepciones y control de excepciones](../../csharp/programming-guide/exceptions/index.md).
